description: Installation of extractor hood duct to roof of industrial building
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of five years from the date of this permission.  REASON:	In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990. | Before the development commences, details shall be submitted to demonstrate that any machinery audible outside the premises will be designed to satisfy an acoustic standard not exceeding NR35 Leq, 5 mins, for plant which will operate during the period of 2300 - 0700 hrs weekdays and any time on Saturdays, Sundays and Bank Holidays, NR40 Leq, 1 hr, for plant which is controlled by time switches only to run during the period of 0700 - 2300 hrs Mondays to Fridays.  REASON: To protect the living conditions of neighbouring occupiers. | Before the development commences, details shall be submitted and approved for installation and operation of the best practicable odour abatement equipment, to be brought into use upon completion of the development and retained permanently.  REASON:  To protect the living conditions of neighbouring occupiers. | The commercial kitchen approved shall be limited to the area shown on the submitted plan numbered 01136-01.  REASON:  To protect the living conditions of neighbouring residential properties.
